b: when touches hand then become next in 0.2s, then tell body blade, then play button click
when touches hand then become next in 0.2s, then tell body blade, then play button click
when told by body blade then become next in 0.2s, then play lightsword on
when told by body blade then become next in 0.2s, then play lightsword off
when hit then play lightsword strike 1
when shaken then play lightsword swing 1
when high speed then play lightsword swing 2
when touches hand then play lightsword hit 1
when touches face then play lightsword hit 2
when told by body shield then become next in 0.2s, then play activate laser
when told by body shield then become next in 0.2s, then play deactivate laser
when touches hand then become next in 0.2s, then play button click 2, then tell body shield
when touches hand then become next in 0.2s, then play button click 2, then tell body shield
